flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
The male with the largest mane of fire
is the leader of the pride.

With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees
Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger.
The females protect the pride’s cubs.

The male with the largest mane of fire
is the leader of the pride.

With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees
Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger.
The females protect the pride’s cubs.

The males are usually lazy, but when attacked
by a strong foe, a male will protect its friends
with no regard for its own safety.

The temperature of its breath is over 10,000
degrees Fahrenheit, but Pyroar doesn’t use it on
its prey. This Pokémon prefers to eat raw meat.
